vote.title:
Authorizing the issuance of limited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $5,000,000.00 for Office of the City Auditor-related projects; and to declare an emergency ($5,000,000.00).

Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
vote.description:
Explanation
This ordinance authorizes the issuance of limited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $5,000,000.00 for Office of the City Auditor-related projects.  The bond sale will be conducted on a negotiated basis.
 
Title
Authorizing the issuance of limited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $5,000,000.00 for Office of the City Auditor-related projects; and to declare an emergency ($5,000,000.00).
 
Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
 
Body
See attached file: City of Columbus - 2023 New Money Bonds - Limited Tax City Auditor Ordinance.pdf
